description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. There is cash out there and it is up to your Avatars to battle it out and grab as much of it as you can. But hurry Avatar Cash Dash is a fast and frantic battle for glory. With 1 to 4 players it's a great game to play on your own or with friends. So thumbs at the ready there's cash to grab. 3-2-1 GO!
